Since the dark days, our great nation has known only peace.
Ours is an elegant system, conceived to nourish and protect.
Your districts are the body, the Capitol is the beating heart.
Your hard work feeds us, and in return we feed and protect you.
But if you resist the system, you starve yourself.
If you fight against it, it is you who will bleed.
I know you will stand with me, with us, with all of us, together as one.
Panem today, Panem tomorrow, Panem forever.
